preterite.spanish: Creí que era una broma hasta que lo vi.
preterite.english: I believed it was a joke until I saw it.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Creíste en mí cuando nadie más lo hacía.
preterite.english: You believed in me when no one else did.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Creíste que ibas a ganar la lotería.
preterite.english: You believed you were going to win the lottery.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Creyó en el proyecto desde el primer momento.
preterite.english: He/She believed in the project from the first moment.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Creímos que llegaríamos a tiempo pero nos equivocamos.
preterite.english: We believed we would arrive on time but we were wrong.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Creísteis que el examen sería más fácil.
preterite.english: You all believed the exam would be easier.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Creyeron que era imposible hasta que lo lograron.
preterite.english: They believed it was impossible until they achieved it.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes
